oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
The added value of organic farming for environment and health: facts and consumer perceptions.
This paper introduces the articles in the Special Issue on Organic Food and Farming.
cf. the related links to get access to each of the individual articles
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Van Huylenbroeck, Guido; Mondelaers, Koen and Aertsens, Joris (2009) The added value of organic farming for environment and health: facts and consumer perceptions. British Food Journal, 11 (10), pp. 1021-1027.
